Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz

24.04.2012 SH SCR17277 Added BNKA_WEBSERVICE_ACCOUNT
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.12.2011 GB SCR16946 Added the BNKA_USEFORFCICOMMISSION
02.03.2011 GB SCR15757 Replaced the logic to retrieve the radio button labels
via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
28.01.2010 GB Disabled button OK if no row in ADMU
27.02.2009 GB SCR14451 Added last parameter for call GB001
27.10.2008 SH SR14060 Added UFB563.PI.USERID = blank
25.10.2007 SH SCR13034 Added BNKA_WKA_ACCOUNT
09.02.2007 SH SCR12308 Added BNKA_IBAN

06.11.2006 AK SCR12052 added (empty) parameter when calling UFB563
on 6.1.2006 WJ SCR9987 change PI_TEXT2
13.12.2005 AK SCR9774updating BANK_NEWBALANCEIf BNKA_NEWBALANCE is changed
on 8.12.2005 WJ SCR9668 write history
on 9.11.2005 WJ SCR9439 change attribute of fields
on 24.10.2005 WJ SCR9169 add new button 'Handling'
19.08.2005 SH SCR8211 Added new field BNKA_RECOGNITIONSTRING

30.06.2005 SH SCR8454 Added new fields BNKA_NVALDAYSPAYMENT and
BNKA_NVALDAYSCHEQUES, changes are written to MQ (118) and history DB
07.06.2005 SH SCR8430 Added 5=Direct payments, 6=No payments to radiobutton

15.08.2003 RR -> SCR4094 Extended radio-button for bank-account
27.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
-- SCR#2716 18.12.2002 SH Removed check BankID/BankAccount with GB001

to open OPH106A in Query or Modify when called from
OPH106D)
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- only used for Button Cancel
-- Not, if a new bankaccount added
-- Leave programm after pressing Button OK or Cancel or pressed key
-- 'Esc'
-- Cancel pressed
-- Validation
-- Write to database
-- extract bank account from IBAN
-- OK
-- Cancel
-- OPH106B --> Daily Totals
-- OPH106I --> Handling
-- IBAN is mandatory related to CTRY_LENGTHIBAN
-- This test must not be done for BANK_LEDG_NO 1/20120 until 1/2028 and 3/20120
-- BNKA_RECOGNITIONSTRING has to be unique in table BNKA
-- Valid BNKA_BANKACCOUNT_NAME
-- Valid BNKA_ADMNO_01 and BNKA_CLNTNO_01
-- Valid BNKA_ADMNO_02 and BNKA_CLNTNO_02
-- Valid BNKA_ADMNO_03 and BNKA_CLNTNO_03
-- Valid BNKA_ADMNO_04 and BNKA_CLNTNO_04
-- Valid BNKA_ADMNO_05 and BNKA_CLNTNO_05
-- If IBAN was not changed we have to call GB009A to extract the account number and bank id
-- Validate BANK_IBAN if entered
... extracted bankaccount from IBAN must match entered bank account number
-- Bankaccount is mandatory
hold the difference btween the old balance and the new balance (table BNKA)
BANK_NEWBALANCE = BANK_NEWBALANCE + V.Difference
-- Change on BNKA_NVALDAYSPAYMENT, inform users via MQ (118)
-- only changes on BNKA_NVALDAYSPAYMENT are written to history
